name: mcp-boilerplate
description: A Cloudflare Workers MCP server template with OAuth authentication, Stripe monetization, and OpenAI Apps SDK integration

scripts.check: pnpm run typecheck && vite build && wrangler deploy --dry-run
scripts.build-deploy: pnpm run build && pnpm run deploy

BASE_URL.description: The base URL of your worker. Example: https://your-worker.workers.dev

WIDGET_DOMAIN.description: The widget domain to provide to OpenAI for the sandbox. No subdomains are supported. Example: https://example.com

OAUTH_ISSUER.description: OAuth 2.1 authorization server issuer URL. Example: https://auth.example.com

OAUTH_JWKS_URI.description: JWKS endpoint for token verification. Example: https://auth.example.com/.well-known/jwks.json

GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID.description: Google OAuth client ID for user authentication

GITHUB_CLIENT_ID.description: GitHub OAuth client ID for user authentication

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret key for API calls

STRIPE_SUBSCRIPTION_PRICE_ID.description: Stripe price ID for subscription tier

STRIPE_ONETIME_PRICE_ID.description: Stripe price ID for one-time payment

STRIPE_METERED_PRICE_ID.description: Stripe price ID for metered/usage-based billing

COOKIE_ENCRYPTION_KEY.description: Encryption key for OAuth state cookies (32 bytes hex)
